DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1 , open-labeled , safety tolerability study treatment subject relapse refractory solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study BIIB015 Relapsed/Refractory Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Age 18 year old time inform consent . Solid tumor relapse refractory least 1 prior anticancer systemic therapy standard therapy exist . ECOG Performance Status < /= 2 . Exclusion Criteria History keratoconjunctivitis , open close angle glaucoma , `` dry eye '' disease . New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Grade II great congestive heart failure . History myocardial infarction within 6 month prior Day 1 . Presence > /= Grade 2 peripheral neuropathy . Known presence central nervous system brain metastasis . Prior therapy conjugate unconjugated maytansine derivative .
